Class StateManageDeliveryRequests

java.lang.Object
controller.DefaultState
controller.StateManageDeliveryRequests
All Implemented Interfaces:
State
public class StateManageDeliveryRequests extends DefaultState
This class represents the state for creating delivery requests.

H4114
